Description: We will drive from our accomodation at Trotoli to reach the parking lot in front of the Calla Fiuli Beach. It is a 1 hour 25 minutes drive. 04:00 hour duration Distance 11,1 km 320 m uphill and 320 m downhill.
Equipment: Don't forget to bring, sunscreen and your swimsuit.
EventName: Sardinia Trip: Hike between Caletta Fuili Cala di Luna
Transportation: It is a 1 hour 25 minutes drive, by car from Trotoli to Calla Fiuli
